pageProduct.name: Vicks Action Cold and Flu Day and Night Relief 48 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Vicks Action Cold & Flu Day & Night relief from 6 cold and flu symptoms: Blocked Nose, Headache, Runny Nose, Sneezing, Sore Throat Pain, Reduces Fever.

Warnings

Not to be given to children under 12 years. - This product may cause sleeplessness. - This medicine may cause drowsiness. If affected do not drive a vehicle or operate machinery. Avoid alcohol. Do not use if foil seal over tablet is broken.

Common Uses

1.Blocked Nose 2.Headache 3.Runny Nose 4.Sneezing 5. Sore Throat Pain 6. Reduces Fever

Ingredients

Day Tablet Contains: Paracetamol 500mg, Phenylephrine Hydrochloride 5mg Night Tablet Contains: Paracetamol 500mg, Phenylephrine Hydrochloride 5mg, Chlorpheniramine Maleate 2mg

Directions

Adult & Children 12 years and over. 2 day tablets in the morning and 2 in the afternoon as required. 2 Night tablets at bedtime as required. Leave 4 to 6 hours between doses. Take with a glass of water. Day tablets: Maximum 4 tablets in 24 hours. Night tablets: Maximum 2 tablets in 24 hours. Keep to the recommended dose. Adults: Do not take this medicine for longer than a days at a time unless advised to do so by a doctor. Children & Adolescents (12-17 years): Do not take longer than 48 hours at a time, unless advised by a doctor. Not to given to children under 12 years
